title: Well Dressed Salad Bar and Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Western, Salad bar, Take-out
description: Same owner as Eight Treasures restaurant. Could create your own salad on a bed of romaine, baby spinach or rocket, choosing from toppings such as chickpeas, kidney beans, shimeiji mushrooms, sunflower seeds and beetroot. Also offers other western dishes. Free Wi-Fi.
